body:
I see.
The requirement for the strict order was eventually fixed. I believe it was a grpc problem (It also occured without verbs) , but I don't know to point over the exact patch that fixed it.

I can see that the retrying window in did places the limitation of 10 seconds only. I will note to myself to increase that in the future. As a temporary fix, you can increase the amount of attempts [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma_mgr.cc#L90 ). Each attempt is 2 seconds.
